title: How I publish my article on Yahoo? - Quora

response.answer_text: Steps to Follow to publish on Yahoo: First step is obviously to write your article .Really important next step is to do a spell check – it’s free and easy to do!Sign-up for Yahoo Contributor Network here : contributor.yahoo.comComplete your profile – Photo , Bio , Interests etc.Click on the “content” tab and select the “Create Content : Article“.Upload your article and fill out requested fields relating to your article.Select the rights relating to your article:A) Exclusive : Not previously published anywhere. (You give away all your rights to Yahoo)B) Non-Exclusive : Not previously published anywhere , but you have the option to republish it. Probably the best option if you own a website/blog and you want to also publish the article there.C) Display Only : Article previously published by you elsewhere. (Important to note that you can only receive performance payments with this option and no upfront payments.)9. Submit and wait for approval. Important! – You must be at least 18 years old and a citizen or legal resident of the United States in order to be able to receive payments from Yahoo. Payments are only made to PayPal once you’ve reached 100 US$ in your Yahoo Contributor account.
